title: Scam Alert.
selftext:
Guys, please pay attention to such scams. This guy contacted us wanting to buy our chocolates. Claims that he sent 30K rather than the 3K which he was supposed to. Later kept on following asking us to return 27K.

Points to note : 
1) No money deposited in account. Please check your statement for these things 

2) Do not send back money. Ask them to do so through NPCI. Or highly likely that you will find double deductions soon.

3) The website is legit but the number and photos do not match.

4) Plus what is with the DP? Couldn't he find anything better.

Reporting this number to cyber crime, loan websites, credit card websites and insurance.


Please be careful and take care. Think multiple times before sending strangers money. Better to take 2nd and 3rd opinion.
comments: That's the most fake dp I have ever seen. Ruk bhai Mai bhi maze leta hun ðŸ˜‚

Challenge accepted. Give me 2-3 days. Have to prepare.

Ending with regards from Modiji
RemindMe! 1 Day
Brother i have only negative balance in my acc wtf are u talking about
leave that, tell us more about your chocolates, where do you sell them, are they homemade, how do we buy?
Lmfao. Using that fake ass dp and then writing "wait 10 mints" loll
